SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RESOURCE INNER JOIN TB_MEMBER A ON TB_RESOURCE.HOLDER = A.MEMBER_NO

SELECT CONVERT((@rownum := @rownum+1), CHAR) AS 번호, A.CODE_NAME AS 자원종류, TB_RESOURCE.MODEL_NM AS 모델명, B.CODE_NAME AS 제조사, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(TB_RESOURCE.PRODUCT_MTN, '%Y%m'),'%Y-%m ') AS 제조년월, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(TB_RESOURCE.PURCHASE_MTN, '%Y%m'),'%Y-%m ') AS 구입년월, C.CODE_NAME AS 화면크기, TB_RESOURCE.SERIAL_NO AS Serial번호, TB_RESOURCE.MAC_ADDR AS MAC주소, D.NAME AS 보유자 FROM TB_RESOURCE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE A ON TB_RESOURCE.RES_CODE = A.CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE B ON TB_RESOURCE.MARK_CODE = B.CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CODE C ON TB_RESOURCE.DISPLAY_SIZE_CODE = C.CODE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MEMBER D ON TB_RESOURCE.HOLDER = D.MEMBER_NO JOIN (SELECT @rownum := 0) R
AND D.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{holder},'%')
